TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_contact
TABLE.COMMENT: Arlo contact mapped to a Moodle user.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle userid

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: An integer value that uniquely identifies this resource within the platform

FIELD.NAME: sourceguid
FIELD.COMMENT: A GUID value that uniquely identifies this resource across any platform

FIELD.NAME: sourcecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: When this resource was created on Arlo

FIELD.NAME: sourcemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Epoch indicating when this resource was last modified on Arlo

FIELD.NAME: modified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time stamp when record modified.

TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_collection
TABLE.COMMENT: Information for syncing collections of resources.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of resource collection.

TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_event
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: An integer value that uniquely identifies this resource.

FIELD.NAME: sourceguid
FIELD.COMMENT: A GUID value that uniquely identifies this resource across any platform

FIELD.NAME: sourcestatus
FIELD.COMMENT: An EventStatus value representing the current state of this event, such as draft, active, completed or cancelled.

FIELD.NAME: sourcecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: When this resource was created on Arlo

FIELD.NAME: sourcemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: When this resource was last modified on Arlo

FIELD.NAME: modified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time stamp when record modified.

TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_instance
TABLE.COMMENT: Extra Arlo information required around a linked Event or Online Activity.

TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_onlineactivity
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: An integer value that uniquely identifies this resource.

FIELD.NAME: sourceguid
FIELD.COMMENT: A GUID value that uniquely identifies this resource across any platform.

FIELD.NAME: modified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time stamp when record modified.

FIELD.NAME: enrolid
FIELD.COMMENT: Associated enrolment instance

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle user account associated with this resource

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: An integer value that uniquely identifies this resource within the platform

FIELD.NAME: sourceguid
FIELD.COMMENT: A GUID value that uniquely identifies this resource across any platform

FIELD.NAME: attendance
FIELD.COMMENT: A RegistrationContactAttendance value indicating whether the Contact attended the Event.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: An string representing the grade associated with this resource

FIELD.NAME: lastactivity
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when there was some activity

FIELD.NAME: progressstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: A user-readable string representing the status of the registration

FIELD.NAME: sourcestatus
FIELD.COMMENT: A RegistrationStatus value representing the current state of this registration, such as pending approval, approved, cancelled, or completed.

FIELD.NAME: sourcecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: When this resource was created on Arlo

FIELD.NAME: sourcemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: When this resource was last modified on Arlo

FIELD.NAME: sourcecontactid
FIELD.COMMENT: Related contact resource mapped contact.sourceid

FIELD.NAME: modified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time stamp when record modified.

TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_result
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_template
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: An integer value that uniquely identifies this resource within the platform

FIELD.NAME: sourceguid
FIELD.COMMENT: A GUID value that uniquely identifies this resource across any platform

FIELD.NAME: code
FIELD.COMMENT: A string representing the short code used when referring to this template

FIELD.NAME: sourcecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: When this resource was created on Arlo.

FIELD.NAME: sourcemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: When this resource was last modified on Arlo

FIELD.NAME: modified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time stamp when record modified.

TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_templatelink
TABLE.COMMENT: Arlo Template linked to Moodle course.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard Moodle primary key.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Moodle course id.

FIELD.NAME: templateguid
FIELD.COMMENT: Arlo template GUID.

FIELD.NAME: delivered
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = Fail, 1 = Success

FIELD.NAME: extra
FIELD.COMMENT: Any extra information

TABLE.NAME: enrol_arlo_requestlog
TABLE.COMMENT: Log API request and response staus and any error information.

FIELD.NAME: platform
FIELD.COMMENT: Arlo platform indicator

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: HTTP status code

FIELD.NAME: extra
FIELD.COMMENT: Any exception/backtrace information
